bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of what originally appeared to be a lou li 瘰癧 , scrofula pervasion-illness, but after opening to fester developed into lou 瘺 , fistula, in some cases with several heads developing into holes. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 34: 此由風邪毒氣客於肌肉，隨 虛處而停，結為瘰癧瘺 , “This is because wind evil poison qi has settled in the muscles and the flesh. It avails itself of depleted locations, and forms nodes to become scrofula pervasion-illness and fistula ”.
